Well, this is fascinating. The plot thickens. Apparently, it was the Baroness's dream to convert this land to a paradise. The Baron had no such plans. He only wanted to analyze and take samples of the many different minerals found in the crust.

How did the Hive King know this? Well, this Baron created him. Created him with the purpose of destroying the Baroness's plants so that she would be more open to the idea of leaving the planet. But then, she demanded the Baron to destroy his creation. Which he did not. He simply, left.
And now the Baroness and the Hive King continue their brutal war, one for revenge and other due to his programming. But if the Baron just left, I wonder what's in his tower?
